chooseTrackStep.selectTracks:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for selecting mentoring tracks
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Choose Track Step (h2 heading)
**When Users See This**: When the user is on the 'Choose Tracks' step of the mentor registration process
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Select the tracks you want to mentor"
chooseTrackStep.allowsUsToShow:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about track selection flexibility
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Choose Track Step (paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When the user is on the 'Choose Tracks' step of the mentor registration process
**Technical Context**: Includes bolded text for emphasis; no variables
**Current English**: "This allows us to only show you the solutions you want to mentor. **Don‚Äôt worry, you can change these selections at anytime.**"
stepIndicator.step:
**Functional Purpose**: Screen reader text for a progress step indicator
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Step Indicator (screen reader only text)
**When Users See This**: When a screen reader user navigates to a step in the mentor registration progress
**Technical Context**: Variables `%{num}` and `%{label}` must remain unchanged. Formats as "Step [num]: [label]".
**Current English**: "Step %{num}: %{label}"
closeButton.closeModal:
**Functional Purpose**: Alternative text for the close modal button icon
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal (close button icon alt text)
**When Users See This**: When the mentor registration modal is open and a user hovers over or focuses on the close button, or when a screen reader announces the button
**Technical Context**: Used as `alt` attribute for an `Icon` component
**Current English**: "Close the modal"
congratulationsStep.youAreNowMentor:
**Functional Purpose**: Main heading announcing successful mentor registration
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Congratulations Step (h2 heading)
**When Users See This**: Upon completing the mentor registration process
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You‚Äôre now a mentor!"
congratulationsStep.thankYouGrateful:
**Functional Purpose**: Secondary heading expressing gratitude to the new mentor
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Congratulations Step (h3 heading)
**When Users See This**: Upon completing the mentor registration process
**Technical Context**: Includes an emoji (üôè); no variables
**Current English**: "Thank you - we‚Äôre so grateful for your commitment üôè"
congratulationsStep.makeGettingStartedEa:
**Functional Purpose**: Introductory text for getting started as a mentor
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Congratulations Step (paragraph below headings)
**When Users See This**: Upon completing the mentor registration process
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "We want to make getting started with mentoring as easy as possible. Watch the video below to learn how to get started."
congratulationsStep.welcomeToMentorTeam:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the welcome video
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Congratulations Step (video header h3)
**When Users See This**: Upon completing the mentor registration process, within the embedded welcome video section
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Welcome to the Mentor Team!"
congratulationsStep.video:
**Functional Purpose**: Metadata for the welcome video (type and duration)
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Congratulations Step (video header paragraph)
**When Users See This**: Upon completing the mentor registration process, within the embedded welcome video section
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Video ¬∑ 0:24"
congratulationsStep.readyToGetStarted:
**Functional Purpose**: Call-to-action button text to proceed to the mentor dashboard
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal ‚Üí Congratulations Step (primary button)
**When Users See This**: Upon completing the mentor registration process
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "I'm ready to get started!"
